--- title: UQRUG 59 draft: false editor: visual date: '2025-02-26' description: '**Overview**: drop in session
**Questions**: renv, Shiny hosting, R version, tmap' categories: meeting toc: true toc-depth: 5 --- ## Topic: R environments with renv You can test cloning the example project: From the command line: ``` bash git clone https://github.com/stragu/renv_example.git ``` Then open the project and see what renv does to adapt your local envrionment according to the renv.lock file. ## Attendees Add your name, where you're from, and why you're here: | Name | Where are you from? | What brings you here? | |----------|---------------------|--------------------------| | Richard | Civil Engineering | | | Hadi | QAAFI | | | St√©phane | Library | Here to help and present | ## Questions and shared resources - "Cannot move 00LOCK" error when installing packages - Issue was related to using Docker on WSL, on which staged install fails. - Solution: run this command before installing packages: - `Sys.setenv(R_INSTALL_STAGED = FALSE)` - Found on: - Building phylogenetic tree with ape and phangorn packages - visualisation ideas: - ggtree: - GitHub: - BioConductor: - book: ## Shared resources Resources shared during the meeting. - Hacky Hour, 3-4 pm every Tuesday (online) - - ask us for the Zoom link!
